CustomField.formula: BLANKVALUE(If(Opportunity__r.DQ_Plan_Date__c, If(Past_Due__c, IF(DQ_LastModifiedDate__c,'All 3 DQIs', IF(!DQ_LastModifiedDate__c,'Past Due & Past Gate','')), IF(DQ_LastModifiedDate__c,'Past Gate & Last Modified', IF(!DQ_LastModifiedDate__c,'Past Gate Only',''))), IF(Past_Due__c, IF(!DQ_LastModifiedDate__c,'Past Due Only', IF(DQ_LastModifiedDate__c,'Past Due & Last Modified','')), IF(DQ_LastModifiedDate__c,'Last Modified Only',''))),'No DQ Issue')
CustomField.label: Data Quality Info
